title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content:
kens

Storyline achievement.

The Lich-Queen's Wrath

After completing The Githyanki Warrior and upon progressing towards the Shadow Cursed Lands, Kith'rak Voss will meet you at your camp. Agree and convince Lae'zel to work with him.

Non-Invasive Procedure

Under Lock and Key

You must free both the deep gnomes and the tieflings from their cells (Rescue the Tieflings).

Storyline achievement.

Murder in Baldur's Gate.

Embrace your Urge

Interfectorem Draconis

Repairing the Weave

To Bloom in
